DOC.brief_summary: This proposal seek gather continuous blood glucose physical activity data individual without diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Diabetes - Observational Study Exercise Blood Glucose Control
DOC.detailed_description: This proposal seek gather continuous blood glucose physical activity data individual without diabetes physically active exercise health benefit . The investigator hypothesize insulin requirement inversely related intensity activity algorithm able detect physical activity automatically adjust insulin dos . Once algorithm determine individual , applied future similar situation , ideally algorithm dynamically refine base closed-loop feedback information .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion subject diabetes Type 1 diabetes insulin require type 2 diabetes least 1 year Use insulin control diabetes Physically active ( regularly work , swim , run , walk , bike , etc . ) Free major micro macrovascular complication diabetes 1875 year age A1C < 9.0 % Inclusion criterion subject without diabetes No evidence diabetes physically active unwilling perform repeat glucose check take insulin instruct abnormal thyroid function , kidney function , liver function pregnancy
